channel.title: Help with coding a lock pick lock door :D
channel.description:
ok well i need help coding this door at the pirates hideout, theres 3 doors but i only need help with one and ill do the rest myself.
my question is how do i make the door require a lock pick to be opened?
i dont care about fails, as long as theres a lock pick in inventory
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/epnkhe.jpg[/img]
